ygData.subject: What's missing in Everquest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Everquest is best thing what i see in online gaming, from graphic to sound and grup sistem but it still miss much things wich leaves too much place to
ygData.messageBody:
Everquest is best thing what i see in online gaming, from graphic to sound
and grup sistem but it still miss much things wich leaves too much place to
concurent products to enter.

First it is hard to add new zones or monsters it request huge uploads (
this can be corrected with addon discs but it is another question), loading
of zones is realy messed up if you just exit one zone it takes soooo long
to reload it again it will be nice to have 2 zones in memory if you have
enough memory for this (i have 128 mb).

it is concentrated on gruping but too hard for solo play for some classes
and i dont like to play necromancer or any pet holder, and gruping have
much flows wich need corection and additional balancing like higer lv mages
and wizards.

Also there are too low gains from questing and one thing wich can add much
to game can be a god questing sistem where many diferent players must
cooperate to reach some target but for now it is only killing stronger MOB
and if you spend 5 hours to resolve quest and in end you dont know a right
word wich you hear on other side of continent you make all way back write a
right word on paper go back and say it only to get 1 rusty sword and 5
copper as a 12 lv caracter not to see any move on your experience bar it is
realy bad. i do it 3 times to 3 diferent quests and as i try hardest things
what i found and after this reward i lost wish to try again.

to be thrue it will be nice to get experience also for trading skills and
give them more variants so a posibility to make all normal armours and
weapons. And it will be nice to have possibility to make a dragon leather
armour ( hint hint)

It will be nice to have some chests wich thiefs can picklock.

Fishing some other things then normal fishs, or other stramge things like
boots with a gen in bag with a surprise big fish wich will pull you in
water and cast summon pirana swarm on you eheheeh

It will be nice to have a place where you can leave your goods to sell and
where you must pass evry now and then to collect all income or it is lost
put this place on some lost plane or limit sellers to some level range, i
wish to buy a totem stah and all mana gain equipment but as im from europe
and i play normaly when all servers are empty i cannot buy or sell nearly
anything. and i play on fenin ro wich is all time full. ( hmm maybe i will
move from rathe mountains not too much people know where this place is
eheheheh)

It is great and wonderfull world but for now it is a little bit empty it
needs a soul, a movement a random orc attacks on kelethim, dark elf rampage
on freeport, dragon flying in sky in unknown direction, strange never seen
beast in dark wood to start legends. More inteligence in program to make
world looks more diferent so that finaly a camping is not more interesting.
It is not need for human intervence it can be done by program if you leave
a orc camp and in zone is many players then why not that orcs group and
start hunting around geting items from falen (eheheh at last some money so
bank will get some real signifikance). Other similar products will come
soon big bad MS is preparing to enter in game on big door ( i just read a
news on its site it will bring some interesting news) the other players are
also on front door for bringing something new soon everquest will not be
only game in 3d rpg town and if a game is not interesting enough when
others come in play ? .... ?



P.S. I like this game very very much and all this critics are only in hope
that it will give some ideas how to make it better and that i will be shure
to play it long long time as i enjoy it now. ( my english is not maxed jet
sorry)
